turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from which pizzeria?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order three medium size pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what would you like for the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicken barbecue please with a thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want the same for all 3?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, im sorry they dont have bbq sauce today, is the white sauce ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What about Meat Lovers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me check that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, you can order the meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like that for all 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: still thin crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me order that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the cost will be $57 for 3 medium meat lover pizzas with thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sure. Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and will you be dining-in or have it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Delivery, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please be aware that the price doesn't include tip

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy
